languages.text: {n}Голос Тервантьяса становится глумливым.{/n} "Бывал{mf||а} ли ты на мире Гордость Сантиэля? Его звезду я забрал совсем недавно, пока ты выпускал{mf||а} кишки ведьмам на арене. Так смешно было наблюдать, как ваша убогая планетка промерзает до самого ядра... Удивительно, что столь ничтожная жертва, как жизни нескольких миллионов мон-кай, может послужить чему-то столь великому, как мой шедевр".

{n}Tervantias's gloating tone becomes insufferable:{/n} "Have you been to the world you mon-keigh know as Santiel's Pride? I only recently took its sun while you were busy spilling Wych guts on the arena floor. It was most amusing to watch your pathetic planet freeze to its very core... How fascinating it is that such a paltry sacrifice as the lives of several million mon-keigh can serve something as great as my masterpiece."
languages.original_text: {n}Голос Тервантьяса становится глумливым.{/n} "Бывал{mf||а} ли ты на мире Гордость Сантиэля? Его звезду я забрал совсем недавно, пока ты выпускал{mf||а} кишки ведьмам на арене. Так смешно было наблюдать, как ваша убогая планетка промерзает до самого ядра... Удивительно, что столь ничтожная жертва, как жизни нескольких миллионов мон-кай, может послужить чему-то столь великому, как мой шедевр".

languages.text: {n}テルヴァンティアスの口調は高慢さを増していく。{/n}「お前たちモン＝ケイは、『サンティエル・プライド』と呼ばれる世界へ行ったことはあるか？お前たちが闘技場の床にウィッチのはらわたを精一杯ぶちまけている間に、俺はその太陽を奪ったのだ。お前たちの哀れな惑星が、芯から凍りついていくのを見るのは非常に愉快だった…数百万程度のモン＝ケイの生命というささやかな代償が、俺の傑作という偉大なるものの役に立つとは素晴らしかろう？」
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias's gloating tone becomes insufferable:{/n} "Have you been to the world you mon-keigh know as Santiel's Pride? I only recently took its sun while you were busy spilling Wych guts on the arena floor. It was most amusing to watch your pathetic planet freeze to its very core... How fascinating it is that such a paltry sacrifice as the lives of several million mon-keigh can serve something as great as my masterpiece."

traits.locale_text: {n}テルヴァンティアスの口調は高慢さを増していく。{/n}「お前たちモン＝ケイは、『サンティエル・プライド』と呼ばれる世界へ行ったことはあるか？お前たちが闘技場の床にウィッチのはらわたを精一杯ぶちまけている間に、俺はその太陽を奪ったのだ。お前たちの哀れな惑星が、芯から凍りついていくのを見るのは非常に愉快だった…数百万程度のモン＝ケイの生命というささやかな代償が、俺の傑作という偉大なるものの役に立つとは素晴らしかろう？」

languages.text: {n}特万提亚斯幸灾乐祸起来，语气让人难以忍受。{/n}“不知道你有没有去过那个被你们猴子称之为‘桑提尔之傲’的世界？当你忙着在竞技场里给那些巫灵开膛破肚的时候，我偷走了那个星系的恒星。你们那颗可悲的行星彻底冻成了冰块……为了我的伟大杰作，几百万猴子献出了他们微不足道的生命，这实在是太令人着迷了！”
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias's gloating tone becomes insufferable:{/n} "Have you been to the world you mon-keigh know as Santiel's Pride? I only recently took its sun while you were busy spilling Wych guts on the arena floor. It was most amusing to watch your pathetic planet freeze to its very core... How fascinating it is that such a paltry sacrifice as the lives of several million mon-keigh can serve something as great as my masterpiece."

traits.locale_text: {n}特万提亚斯幸灾乐祸起来，语气让人难以忍受。{/n}“不知道你有没有去过那个被你们猴子称之为‘桑提尔之傲’的世界？当你忙着在竞技场里给那些巫灵开膛破肚的时候，我偷走了那个星系的恒星。你们那颗可悲的行星彻底冻成了冰块……为了我的伟大杰作，几百万猴子献出了他们微不足道的生命，这实在是太令人着迷了！”

languages.text: {n}Le ton jubilatoire de Tervantias se fait insupportable :{/n} « Avez-vous visité le monde que vous autres mon-keigh connaissez sous le nom de Gloire de Santiel ? Je me suis emparé de son soleil il y a peu, pendant que vous étiez occupés à éventrer des Cérastes dans l'arène. J'ai pris beaucoup de plaisir à voir votre pathétique planète se figer pour toujours... Dire que le maigre sacrifice de quelques millions de mon-keigh sert la noble cause qu'est mon chef-d'œuvre... Fascinant, n'est-ce pas ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias's gloating tone becomes insufferable:{/n} "Have you been to the world you mon-keigh know as Santiel's Pride? I only recently took its sun while you were busy spilling Wych guts on the arena floor. It was most amusing to watch your pathetic planet freeze to its very core... How fascinating it is that such a paltry sacrifice as the lives of several million mon-keigh can serve something as great as my masterpiece."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le ton jubilatoire de Tervantias se fait insupportable :{/n} « Avez-vous visité le monde que vous autres mon-keigh connaissez sous le nom de Gloire de Santiel ? Je me suis emparé de son soleil il y a peu, pendant que vous étiez occupés à éventrer des Cérastes dans l'arène. J'ai pris beaucoup de plaisir à voir votre pathétique planète se figer pour toujours... Dire que le maigre sacrifice de quelques millions de mon-keigh sert la noble cause qu'est mon chef-d'œuvre... Fascinant, n'est-ce pas ? »

languages.text: {n}El tono jactancioso de Tervantias alcanza cotas insufribles:{/n} «¿Has visitado el mundo que los mon-keigh llamáis Orgullo de Santiel? Me llevé su sol hace poco, mientras estabas derramando la sangre de las brujas de la arena. Fue divertido ver cómo vuestro patético planeta se congelaba hasta el núcleo... Es fascinante, el mero sacrificio de unos pocos millones de mon-keigh puede contribuir a algo tan grandioso como mi obra maestra».
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias's gloating tone becomes insufferable:{/n} "Have you been to the world you mon-keigh know as Santiel's Pride? I only recently took its sun while you were busy spilling Wych guts on the arena floor. It was most amusing to watch your pathetic planet freeze to its very core... How fascinating it is that such a paltry sacrifice as the lives of several million mon-keigh can serve something as great as my masterpiece."

traits.locale_text: {n}El tono jactancioso de Tervantias alcanza cotas insufribles:{/n} «¿Has visitado el mundo que los mon-keigh llamáis Orgullo de Santiel? Me llevé su sol hace poco, mientras estabas derramando la sangre de las brujas de la arena. Fue divertido ver cómo vuestro patético planeta se congelaba hasta el núcleo... Es fascinante, el mero sacrificio de unos pocos millones de mon-keigh puede contribuir a algo tan grandioso como mi obra maestra».

languages.text: {n}Tervantias' Schadenfreude wird unerträglich:{/n} "Wart Ihr schon in der Welt, die Ihr Chem-Pan-Sey Santiels Stolz nennt? Ich habe mir erst kürzlich seine Sonne geholt, während Ihr damit beschäftigt wart, in der Arena Hektariblut zu vergießen. Es war ausgesprochen amüsant, zu beobachten, wie Euer armseliger Planet zu Eis erstarrte ... Ist es nicht faszinierend, dass ein so belangloses Opfer wie das Leben mehrerer Millionen Chem-Pan-Sey etwas so Großem wie meinem Meisterstück dienen kann?"
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias's gloating tone becomes insufferable:{/n} "Have you been to the world you mon-keigh know as Santiel's Pride? I only recently took its sun while you were busy spilling Wych guts on the arena floor. It was most amusing to watch your pathetic planet freeze to its very core... How fascinating it is that such a paltry sacrifice as the lives of several million mon-keigh can serve something as great as my masterpiece."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tervantias' Schadenfreude wird unerträglich:{/n} "Wart Ihr schon in der Welt, die Ihr Chem-Pan-Sey Santiels Stolz nennt? Ich habe mir erst kürzlich seine Sonne geholt, während Ihr damit beschäftigt wart, in der Arena Hektariblut zu vergießen. Es war ausgesprochen amüsant, zu beobachten, wie Euer armseliger Planet zu Eis erstarrte ... Ist es nicht faszinierend, dass ein so belangloses Opfer wie das Leben mehrerer Millionen Chem-Pan-Sey etwas so Großem wie meinem Meisterstück dienen kann?"

languages.text: {n}Tervantias'ın sinsi ses tonu iyice katlanılmazlaşıyor.{/n} "Siz mon-keighlerin Santiel'in Gururu olarak bildiği dünyada hiç bulundun mu? Arenada yere Viç organı dökmekle meşgul olduğunuz sırada oranın güneşini de çaldım. Acınası gezegeninizin çekirdeğine kadar donuşunu izlemek çok eğlendiriciydi. Birkaç milyon değersiz mon-keigh'in canını kurban etmenin, başyapıtım gibi ulu bir şeye hizmet edebiliyor oluşu gerçekten muazzam."
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias's gloating tone becomes insufferable:{/n} "Have you been to the world you mon-keigh know as Santiel's Pride? I only recently took its sun while you were busy spilling Wych guts on the arena floor. It was most amusing to watch your pathetic planet freeze to its very core... How fascinating it is that such a paltry sacrifice as the lives of several million mon-keigh can serve something as great as my masterpiece."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tervantias'ın sinsi ses tonu katlanılamaz bir hâle geliyor:{/n} "Siz mon-keighlerin Santiel'in Gururu olarak bildiği dünyada hiç bulundun mu? Siz arenada yere Viç organı dökmekle meşgulken, yakın zamanda oranın güneşini de çaldım. Acınası gezegeninizin çekirdeğine kadar donuşunu izlemek çok eğlendiriciydi. Birkaç milyon değersiz mon-keigh yaşamını kurban etmenin, başyapıtım gibi ulu bir şeye hizmet edebiliyor oluşu gerçekten muazzam."
